snippet: The extended ad isn’t telling voters that everything is rosy after three years of the Obama presidency. Instead, it suggests that it could all have been so much worse.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley analyzes The Road We've Traveled, Pres Obama's 17-minute re-election documentary, noting that it paints a heroic picture of a leader who led the US away from the brink of catastrophe during his first term.
lead_paragraph: The extended ad isn’t telling voters that everything is rosy after three years of the Obama presidency. Instead, it suggests that it could all have been so much worse.

headline.seo: Obama Campaign Video Plays It Stark
headline.main: Obama Campaign Video Serves Up a Heroic Vision of Catastrophe Averted
headline.print_headline: Obama Campaign Video Serves Up a Heroic Vision of Catastrophe Averted
